description: This file defines a React context provider for handling remote control key events, specifically for a Samsung TV environment. It manages registration of component-specific key handlers, dispatches key events from a remote input service, and provides hooks for components to interact with remote key events.

methods.name: dispatchKey
methods.description: Dispatches remote key events to the most recently registered handler that handles the specific key.

methods.name: RemoteProvider
methods.description: React component that provides remote key handling context; subscribes to remote key events and manages handler stack.

methods.name: useRemoteKeys
methods.description: Hook for components to access the remote key handlers context.
